attributes.action: Remove the title "Honourable/ Right Honourable from Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To remove "Honourable/Right Honourable" from Members of Parliament until such time as the Title is earned, and Members are no longer held in contempt by the British Public

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
